objects.text:
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• 3.0-inch Tilting LCD Screen
• Advanced Autofocus System
• Film Simulation Modes

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium X-Series mirrorless camera system with classic retro design
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile 3.0-inch tilting LCD screen for flexible shooting angles
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Multiple manual control dials for quick access to essential settings
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Advanced autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and professional layout tailored for a tech-savvy audience. It centers around a high-resolution camera image (`product_image`) placed prominently on the left side, balanced by key textual elements on the right. The main headline is split across two impactful text layers: `heading_1` in bold white and `heading_2` in vivid red, enhancing legibility and attention. Below, a sleek `tagline` adds sophistication. The `description` text outlines product features in a bulleted style. The red `price` detail gives a clear callout to affordability, and a rounded red rectangular `cta_button` hosts the bold white `cta` inviting users to take action. The `subheading` reinforces the product model. A dark blue geometric background and subtle design accents convey modernity and depth.

**Color Palette:**  
- Midnight Blue: #1A2A4A  
- Dark Navy: #0F172A  
- Crimson Red: #E63946  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Graphite Black (for shadows and objects)
product_color: The product image features a sleek Fujifilm X-T10 camera characterized by a dominant matte black finish, evoking a professional and high-tech aesthetic. The camera body uses deep black (#0A0A0A) and charcoal gray (#2C2C2C) to emphasize durability and elegance. Accents like the white text (#FFFFFF) and red focal length markings (#FF4C4C) provide visual contrast and guide user attention. The lens glass features subtle greenish-yellow reflections (#BDCFAF, #F2E6A2), blending smoothly into the dark tones while adding depth and dimension. This color palette – bold, minimalistic, and modern – creates a refined and dynamic look, ideal for crafting an advertisement banner with sophistication and clarity.
